OrgName.entry: WOMEN IN SET TEAM (WISET) - SHEFFIELD HALLAM UNIVERSITY

AltName.entry: WOMEN IN SCIENCE, ENGINEERING, TECHNOLOGY AND THE BUILT ENVIRONMENT

Desc.entry: Offers a range of projects providing a model for breaking down barriers and tackling gender stereotyping in the Science, Engineering, Technology and Built Environment sectors. Activities include girls' taster days, training for careers advisors and further education and higher education lecturers, and upskilling courses for women and girls in non-traditional subject areas including DIY. Also works with employers to encourage and promote good practice in the recruitment, retention and promotion of women in non-traditional occupations.
